alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 31 at 12:34PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...An intense snow shower will impact portions of south central Lake County through 115 PM MST... At 1233 PM MST, trained weather spotters reported an intense snow shower near St. Ignatius, or 20 miles south of Polson. This shower was nearly stationary. Heavy snow was being reported between St. Ignatius and Ronan, creating near whiteout conditions. Travel with care throughout the day today. HAZARD...Visibility one-quarter mile or less. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Low visibility could result in dangerous driving conditions. Locations impacted include... St. Ignatius, Allentown, Kicking Horse, Charlo and Fort Connah. This includes Highway 93 N between mile markers 31 and 42. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
